name: LinkedIn Manager
description: Multi-service LinkedIn management platform built with Spring Boot and FastAPI.
fullDescription: LinkedIn Manager is a distributed application that allows users to manage and analyze multiple LinkedIn profiles. The platform uses a Spring Boot backend for core API handling, scheduling, and profile management, while separate FastAPI microservices handle authentication, session validation, and LinkedIn web crawling. The system emphasizes modularity and clarity of service boundaries, enabling future expansion into analytics and automation features without relying on containerization or orchestration frameworks.
features: Spring Boot backend for profile management and API routing
FastAPI microservices for authentication and LinkedIn web scraping
Lightweight inter-service communication via REST endpoints
Centralized PostgreSQL persistence for user and session data
